---
id: get-branches
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /branches endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /branches)```. **FamilyType**: ```Canais de Atendimentos``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619413799/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Canais+de+Atendimento+-+v2.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client."

info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /branches endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/open-data/v2/channels/branches"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /branches)```. **FamilyType**: ```Canais de Atendimentos``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619413799/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Canais+de+Atendimento+-+v2.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

According to Art.15. Banking Service Points (PAB), Advanced Service Points (PAA), Transitory Service Points (PAT), Gold Purchase Points (PCO), Cooperative Service Points (PAC), Microcredit Service Points (PAM), Collection and Payment Bank Points (PAP) and Exchange Points currently in operation will be considered PA. * `POSTO_ATENDIMENTO_ELETRONICO`: Electronic Service Point is the dependency constituted by one or more self-service terminals, subordinate to the agency or the institution's headquarters, intended for the provision of services by electronic means, and may be fixed or mobile, permanent or temporary. * `UNIDADE_ADMINISTRATIVA_DESMEMBRADA `: Dismembered Administrative Unit (UAD) according to Resolution 4072, BCB, 2012, in Art. 8º is a dependency intended for the execution of administrative activities
